Sentencas: Samples of 8 mol% Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 (8YSZ) doped with Fe were prepared and sintered at 1350 degrees C in air or argon atmosphere.
Titulo: Detection of phases in Fe-doped YSZ by XRD and Raman spectroscopy

Sentencas: The sintered samples were characterized by SEM, XRD, and Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Detection of phases in Fe-doped YSZ by XRD and Raman spectroscopy

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy and XRD were found to complement each other in phase identification; all the sintered samples were shown to possess tetragonal phase (t) whose axial ratio (c/a) is equal to 1 in the cubic matrix.
Titulo: Detection of phases in Fe-doped YSZ by XRD and Raman spectroscopy

Sentencas: The Raman peak at 616 cm(-1), in general, was seen to broaden with increase in Fe concentration for both sintering atmospheres.
Titulo: Detection of phases in Fe-doped YSZ by XRD and Raman spectroscopy
